raw_body: Fernando – Lion Capt. Jermyn L.C. (Founder,​ Chairman and Managing Director of Suntan Beach Resorts (Pvt) Ltd.) Beloved husband of Hazel,​ loving father of Dilanjan Lakraj Jayasooriya,​ father-in-law of Dr. Chamindi Jayasooriya,​ grandfather of Kiara and Andrew,​ Son of late Clarence. Fernando and Miriam Fernando,​ brother of Locksley and Desmond,​ brother-in-law of late Septi and late Anurika,​ was called to rest in the arms of Jesus on 15th July 2023. Remains lie at his residence at No. 20/​2,​ Borella Cross Road,​ Colombo 8. Funeral service will take place at 2:30 p.m. on Monday,​ 17th July at the residence followed by burial at Borella General Cemetery at 3:30 p.m. (Roman Catholic Section)044021
